title: specimen process
extract: Specimen Accessioning and Processing (Lab Receiving) Specimen Accessioning and Processing (Laboratory Receiving) is the section of the laboratories where specimens are received, sorted, entered into the Laboratory Information System, labelled with barcoded labels and processed.
extract_html: Specimen Accessioning and Processing (Lab Receiving) Specimen Accessioning and Processing (Laboratory Receiving) is the section of the laboratories where specimens are received, sorted, entered into the Laboratory Information System, labelled with barcoded labels and processed.
